title: Topic 02 Question 29
body: You have an Azure subscription that contains a group named Group1 and an Azure SQL managed instance that hosts a database named DB1.
You need to ensure that Group1 has read access to new tables created in DB1. The solution must use the principle of least privilege.
How should you complete the Transact-SQL statement? To answer, select the appropriate options in the answer area.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.
